body:
HackerRank for Work allows you to cancel or delete a test invite that you have already sent to a candidate.  

Prerequisites:

  • You must have created the test and already sent out the invite to the said candidate

Steps

  1. Log into your HackerRank for Work account and open the test from which you want to cancel candidate invites.
  2. In the ‘Candidates’ tab, click on the three-dot menu to the far right of a candidate name, and click on ‘Cancel invite’ from the drop-down. This deletes the Candidate record from the Test.
Canceling a Test invite
title: How can I cancel a Test invite?
